TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_salengacay_a_bayu, title = salengacay_a_bayu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/salengacay_a_bayu} }

S.FORM: salengacay a bayu (kamu nu Hulam: 白令海峽) , mutules tu Cu-ke-ci a bayu (nuamis a cuedetay a dawhang" atu salengacay a bayu "Tay-ping-yang"). u sulit nu zuma a kamu Sakizaya a kamu: salengacay a bayu u sulit nu Hulam: 白令海峽 u sulit nu Lipun: べーリング海峡 u sulit nu Amilika: Bering Strait

salengacay a bayo (kamo no Holam: 白令海峽) , motoles to Co-ke-ci a bayo (noamis a coedetay a dawhang" ato salengacay a bayo "Tay-ping-yang"). o solit no zoma a kamo Sakizaya a kamo: salengacay a bayo o solit no Holam: 白令海峽 o solit no Lipon: べーリング海峡 o solit no Amilika: Bering Strait
